text: The Barren Marches are the [[barony]] of the [[Second Son]], the [[archfey]] representing the jealous heir who stands just beyond the claim to a title, and is always scheming to usurp what does not belong to him. No matter the story he appears in, his lands are always inferior to those of his sibling(s).
title: Barren Marches
tooltip: Thelanis barony of the Second Son
